daedalusTransfer.error.webSocketRestoreE: Terjadi kesalahan saat memulihkan address blockchain.
daedalusTransfer.errorPage.title.label: Pemulihan wallet Daedalus tidak berhasil.
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.step0: Masukkan 12 kata frasa pemulihan yang digunakan untuk memulihkan wallet Daedalus Anda untuk mengembalikan saldo Anda dan mentransfer semua dana dari Daedalus ke Yoroi.
Masukkan unencrypted master key wallet Daedalus Anda untuk mengembalikan salo dan mengirim semua dana dari Daedalus ke Yoroi.
Masukkan 27 kata frasa pemulihan yang digunakan untuk back up paper wallet Daedalus Anda untuk mengembalikan saldo dan mentransfer semua dana dari Daedalus ke Yoroi.
Transfer semua dana dari wallet Daedalus
Transfer semua dana dari Daedalus master key
Transfer semua dana dari paper wallet Daedalus

Yoroi and Daedalus wallets use different key derivation schemes, and the address format is different on each. Due to this, at present the funds from a Daedalus wallet cannot be simply imported directly into Yoroi. Instead, you must create a Yoroi wallet and transfer your funds over from Daedalus. (Daedalus and Yoroi wallets are fully compatible for transferring funds.) If you do not currently have Daedalus installed, or if you cannot access it, you can enter your 12-word recovery phrase from Daedalus (or 27 words for a paper wallet) and transfer your entire wallet balance over from Daedalus into Yoroi.

settings.general.aboutYoroi.label: Tentang Yoroi
settings.general.languageSelect.info: For EMURGO, friendliness in Yoroi is an important topic. We believe understanding blockchain concepts is easier in your native language. We try supporting as many languages as possible, but for a broader selection of languages we need to accept the help from community translators. The selected language translation is fully provided by the community.
settings.general.languageSelect.labelInf: The selected language translation is fully provided by the community
settings.general.title: Pengaturan Umum
settings.general.translation.acknowledgm: Thank you to the following for their contribution:

settings.paperWallet.createPaper.label: Buat Paper Wallet
PDF paper wallet Anda sudah siap
settings.paperWallet.dialog.finalize.int: to keep the paper document and secret words safe.
to remember the password, or write it down and keep it safe!
settings.paperWallet.dialog.password.int: Yoroi Paper Wallets are encrypted with a password.
You must have it to restore your funds!
It is your own responsibility to make sure you remember it.
settings.paperWallet.dialog.verify.messa: This is the final step. Please verify the mnemonic phrase (printed on the PDF certificate) and the password to make sure you have all the valid information to *access your funds later*. On the next screen you will also be able to verify the account checksum and copy your new addresses.
settings.paperWallet.printIdentification: Enabling this will help you verify your wallet at the moment of restoration, but it will also **forfeit plausible deniability**.
settings.support.faq.content: Jika Anda mengalami masalah, silakan lihat {faqLink} untuk panduan tentang masalah-masalah umum.
settings.support.faq.title: Pertanyaan yang sering diajukan
settings.support.logs.content: Jika Anda ingin memeriksa log, Anda dapat {downloadLogsLink}. Log tidak mengandung informasi sensitif, dan akan sangat membantu untuk melampirkannya ke laporan masalah untuk membantu tim menyelidiki masalah yang dialami.
settings.support.logs.title: Log
settings.support.reportProblem.content: Jika FAQ tidak menyelesaikan masalah yang Anda alami, silakan gunakan fitur {supportRequestLink} kami.
settings.support.reportProblem.title: Melaporkan masalah
testnet.label.message: WARNING: This is a {network} network. ADA has no monetary value here. For more information, check out the FAQ at {faqLink}
transfer.form.instructions.step1.text: Diperlukan sekitar 1 menit untuk mengembalikan saldo Anda. Pada langkah berikutnya, Anda akan diberikan transaksi yang akan memindahkan semua dana Anda. Harap tinjau detail transaksi dengan cermat. Anda harus membayar biaya transaksi standar pada jaringan Cardano untuk melakukan transaksi.
transfer.form.masterkey.input.label: Master key
transfer.form.masterkey.requirement: Catatan: master key adalah 192 karakter dan hexadecimal-encoded
transfer.instructions.instructions.text: Sebelum Anda dapat mentransfer dana, Anda harus membuat dompet Yoroi dan mem-back up-nya. Setelah selesai, Anda akan menerima 15 kata frase pemulihan yang dapat digunakan untuk mengembalikan wallet Yoroi Anda kapan saja.

wallet.add.dialog.createLedgerWalletNoti: Ledger Connect is currently in progress. Until it completes, it is not possible to restore or import new wallets.
wallet.add.dialog.createTrezorWalletNoti: Trezor Connect sedang berlangsung. Sebelum ini selesai, tidak dimungkinkan untuk mengembalikan atau mengimpor wallet baru.
wallet.add.dialog.restoreNotificationMes: Pengembalian wallet sedang dilakukan. Sebelum ini selesai, tidak dimungkinkan untuk mengembalikan atau mengimpor wallet baru.
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.ledge: A Ledger hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.trezo: A Trezor hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.normalWa: The simplest and most common way to create a Wallet. Yoroi will generate 15 mnemonic words that you will have to store in a safe place in order to restore the wallet.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.paperWal: Allows the generation of an offline wallet that should be printed. The process involves setting up an optional password for extra security and then printing a pdf that contains the mnemonics (for later recovery) and some Cardano addresses onto a paper.

wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: Pastikan tidak ada yang melihat layar Anda kecuali Anda menginginkan mereka mengakses dana Anda.
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec:
Pada layar berikut, Anda akan melihat 15 kata yang dipilih secara acak. Ini adalah 
    frase back up wallet Anda. Ini dapat dimasukkan dalam Yoroi versi mana pun untuk 
    mem-back up atau mengembalikan dana wallet dan private key Anda.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di:
Harap pastikan Anda telah menyalin frasa pemulihan dengan hati-hati di tempat yang aman. 
    Anda akan memerlukan frasa ini untuk menggunakan dan memulihkan wallet Anda. Huruf besar-kecil berpengaruh untuk frasa.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: Saya memahami bahwa secret key saya disimpan dengan aman hanya di perangkat ini, tidak di server yang dimiliki perusahaan.

Saya mengerti bahwa jika aplikasi ini dipindahkan ke perangkat lain atau dihapus, uang saya 
    hanya dapat dikembalikan dengan frasa back up yang telah saya salin dan simpan di tempat yang aman.
Klik setiap kata dalam urutan yang benar untuk memverifikasi frasa pemulihan Anda
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.about.prer: Your computer must remain connected to the Internet throughout the process.
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.connect.in: This process shares the Cardano public key with Yoroi.

Aplikasi Cardano ADA harus diinstal pada perangkat Ledger.
Cardano ADA app must remain open on the Ledger device.
The Ledger device must remain connected to your computer throughout the process.
wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.step.connec: After connecting your Ledger device to your computer's USB port, press the Connect button.

The Trezor device must remain connected to your computer throughout the process.
